S.FORM: Kerunpiya Gaga kska Kska Hunac Meycow ka Columbia, 4 00 N, 72 00 W ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 1,138,910 sq km(hangan na o Tg26)(knlbanga dxgal o 1,038,700 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 100,210 sq km). Kana ka sejiqun o niqan 47,220,856 hiyi. Gaga Bogota ka pusu alang paru, jiyax 20 idas 7 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Manu ka dxgal Columbia ga wada sugan 37.50 ka dxgal qpahan, 54.40 ka dxgal bbuyu, rahuq dxgal do niqan 8.10 na. Bukung klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Juan Manuel Santos, pnaah hngkawas2010 idas 8 jiyax 7pnrajing kmlawa klwaan.
